name: A thick fur coat
data: It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoints pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
Thick fur coat affects its user's resistance against cold.
Thick fur coat affects its user's hit points.
Thick fur coat affects its user's skills.
